description: Removal of conditions 11 (hard and soft landscaping),12 ( no alterations of levels) of planning permission dated 21st December 2021 (RN  21/05074/FULL) for the Extension and lowering of an existing basement, including increasing the size, depth and width of lightwell to the rear (Hamilton Garden elevation), housing an A/C unit, alterations to rear access at ground floor,  new lead roof incorporating one dormer to each elevation and one sky; replacement double glazed timber frame windows throughout and rebuilding of front and rear garden walls. NAMELY, Reduced hard landscaping and increased soft landscaping areas to promote sustainable; drainage to the development; Varied planting within planters where possible equivalent in overall area to the existing, and potted plants where not possible, promoting biodiversity. Replacement tree to felled Irish Yew.
